content: I'll definitely try out those tips for creating a personalized playlist on Spotify. I've been listening to The 1975's albums nonstop since the festival, and I think I'll make a playlist with all their songs I want to hear live next time. Speaking of live performances, do you know any good resources for finding concert reviews and videos of live shows? I loved watching videos of The 1975's previous concerts to get a sense of what to expect at the festival.
